views.markdown:
- should fix the Install Error Users with iOs 9.1 or higher should install libstatus9 from Bigboss., I don´t know why, but I does this not automatically! - fix for Whatsapp messages Should fix issues with other Apps.

I will fix the existing Bug for the Sound Settings asap.
- hopfully fix some errors for Other Apps on iOS 10

There is still a bug with the Sound´s I will fix this asap.
- should fix some Freezes on iOS 9.3.3 - iOS 10 Support
- support for iOS 9.3.3
- removed the Option for Statusbar Icons for ios 9.1 and above (libstatusbar needs a Update)
- added full Support for Calender
- Improvements for Twitter (other apps) now works for mentions and following

- reduced Size
- improvement for Ipad Users
- fixed Bug for Setting

- fixed Bug for Statusbar Icons

- added support for your own Apps!

- hope this fixes some Bugs for Iphone 6s and 6s+ Users

- fixed Bug for Mail

added Support for:
- Mail (Standard App)
- Viper
- Threema

- fixed Bug for Snoozed Alarm´s
